title: Coronavirus being monitored at all airports of country: Dr Zafar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 27 (APP):Special Assistant to Prime Minister on Health Dr Zafar Mirza Monday said that the situation emerged from the outbreak of Coronavirus is being closely monitored at all international airports of the country and the concerned authorities had been directed to take strict measures for scanning of every person coming from abroad.
Talking to a private news channel, he said there was no credible information regarding positive case of Corona irus had been so far received from across the country and only suspected patients had been kept in isolation centres for diagnosis procedure.
Dr Zafar Mirza further said the real cause of the Coronavirus outbreak had not been so far identified but it mostly transmitted from one person to another posing threat to life.
